snippet: Pope Francis removed Cardinal Raymond L. Burke, who has questioned the pontiff’s leadership, from his post as head of the Vatican’s highest judicial authority.
abstract: Pope Francis officially removes Cardinal Raymond L Burke as head of Vatican's highest judicial authority; Burke is powerful American cardinal who has emerged as unabashed conservative critic of reform agenda and leadership style that Francis has brought to the church.
lead_paragraph: Pope Francis removed Cardinal Raymond L. Burke, who has questioned the pontiff’s leadership, from his post as head of the Vatican’s highest judicial authority.

headline.main: Pope Demotes U.S. Cardinal Critical of His Reform Agenda
headline.print_headline: Pope Demotes U.S. Cardinal Critical of His Reform Agenda
